# isExternal | Apple Developer Documentation

Instance Property# isExternal

Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.0+

```
var isExternal: Bool { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/XMLDTDNode/isExternal#discussion)

True if the system id is set. Valid for entities and notations.

## [See Also](/documentation/Foundation/XMLDTDNode/isExternal#see-also)

### [Managing DTD Identifiers](/documentation/Foundation/XMLDTDNode/isExternal#Managing-DTD-Identifiers)

[`var notationName: String?`](/documentation/foundation/xmldtdnode/notationname)Returns the name of the notation associated with the receiver.[`var publicID: String?`](/documentation/foundation/xmldtdnode/publicid)Returns the public identifier associated with the receiver.[`var systemID: String?`](/documentation/foundation/xmldtdnode/systemid)Returns the system identifier associated with the receiver.
